definition: four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
four/4
quick/alert/efficacious/effective/to come true/spirit/departed soul/coffin

sentences.english: Four brilliant poets in Yongjia are members of a poetic school during the South Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “永嘉四灵”是南宋时期的一个诗歌流派。

definition: Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
